This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS check XMLSerializer.serializeToString method could parsing xmldoc to string
PASS Check if the default namespace is correctly reset.
PASS Check if there is no redundant empty namespace declaration.
FAIL check XMLSerializer.serializeToString escapes attribute values for roundtripping assert_equals: expected "<root><child1 attr1=\"value1&#9;value2&#xD;&#xA;\">value1</child1></root>" but got "<root><child1 attr1=\"value1&#9;value2&#13;&#10;\">value1</child1></root>"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
